## MentionExtension.defaultOptions property

Provide the default options for this extension

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly defaultOptions: {
        matchers: never[];
        appendText: string;
        mentionClassName: string;
        extraAttrs: never[];
        mentionTag: "a";
        suggestTag: "a";
        onChange: () => boolean;
        onExit: () => boolean;
        onCharacterEntry: () => boolean;
        keyBindings: {};
    };
```
